sn35.2:1.3: And what’s not-self should be truly seen with right understanding like this: ‘This is not mine, I am not this, this is not my self.’
sn35.2:1.10: And what’s not-self should be truly seen with right understanding like this: ‘This is not mine, I am not this, this is not my self.’
sn35.2:1.12: They understand: ‘… there is no return to any state of existence.’”
